name: SkySail
description:
Our game is a 2D platformer that tackles the serious issue of drug abuse. It tells the story of a protagonist who finds himself trapped in a recurring nightmare due to his drug addiction. It is the player's responsibility to guide the protagonist through his journey to redemption, using the power of his good memories.

The game's storyline is action-packed and filled with challenges. The game features an amazing soundtrack that gets more intense as the game progresses, which makes the gameplay more thrilling. The game's complexity is enhanced with the inclusion of a sanity system that the player must manage by staying in the light and searching for items that remind him of his childhood and past mistakes.

The game's smooth player movement makes it challenging to navigate through the levels, requiring the player's utmost concentration and agility to avoid obstacles and make it to the end of each stage. Overall, our game aims to raise awareness for drug abuse while providing a thrilling, entertaining gameplay experience for players.
